hero.title: Hi, I'm a Product-minded Frontend Developer
hero.subtitle: Startup Founder | AI-powered Development Enthusiast
hero.description: Currently building the yoga tech ecosystem with two live products while exploring part-time opportunities to share insights and contribute to innovative teams.

about.title: About Me
about.description: 4.5 years of frontend development experience across various projects.
paragraphs: I help startups and teams bring their ideas to life as actual products.
Through experience with various projects including SaaS platforms, data dashboards, and mobile apps, I can quickly design and develop user-friendly interfaces using React and Next.js.
I value not only coding but also smooth communication, working closely with planners, designers, and backend developers to deliver valuable features.
If your project requires fast execution and quality, I'm ready to collaborate.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Let's talk about projects and collaboration opportunities
